nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member conservationCheck is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the conservationCheck analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_write_to_logfile
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if the conservation check is written to the log file.

nml_option.name: config_AM_conservationCheck_restart_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the restart stream the analysis member will use to initialize itself if restart is enabled.
nml_option.possible_values: A restart stream with state of the conservation check.

package.name: conservationCheckAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the conservationCheck analysis member.

var.name: initialEnergy
var.description: Total initial energy of ice and snow

var.name: finalEnergy
var.description: Total final energy of ice and snow

var.name: energyChange
var.description: Total energy change of ice and snow during time step

var.name: netEnergyFlux
var.description: Net energy flux to ice

var.name: absoluteEnergyError
var.description: Absolute energy conservation error

var.name: relativeEnergyError
var.description: Relative energy conservation error

var.name: accumulatedLatentHeatFlux
var.description: Latent heat flux from coupler, integrated in space and time. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedSensibleHeatFlux
var.description: Sensible heat flux from coupler, integrated in space and time. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedLongWaveHeatFluxUp
var.description: Upward long Wave heat flux from coupler, integrated in space and time. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedLongWaveHeatFluxDown
var.description: Downward long wave heat flux from coupler, integrated in space and time. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedShortWaveHeatFlux
var.description: shortwave heat flux from coupler, integrated in space and time. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedSeaIceHeatFlux
var.description: Sea ice heat flux from coupler, integrated in space and time. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedMeltingSnowHeatFlux
var.description: This is snowFlux * latent_heat_fusion_mks. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedMeltingIceRunoffHeatFlux
var.description: This is iceRunoffFlux * latent_heat_fusion_mks. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedRemovedIceRunoffHeatFlux
var.description: This is iceRunoffFlux * latent_heat_fusion_mks. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedIcebergHeatFlux
var.description: Iceberg heat flux from coupler, integrated in space and time. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedFrazilHeatFlux
var.description: Heat flux from frazil, integrated in space and time, given to couipler. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedLandIceHeatFlux
var.description: Land ice heat flux, integrated in space and time. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedLandIceFrazilHeatFlux
var.description: Land ice heat flux from frazil, integrated in space and time, given to couipler. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedRainTemperatureFlux
var.description: Heat flux associated with rain. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedEvapTemperatureFlux
var.description: Heat flux associated with Evaporation. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedSeaIceTemperatureFlux
var.description: Heat flux associated with sea ice melt water. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedRiverRunoffTemperatureFlux
var.description: Heat flux associated with river runoff. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedIcebergTemperatureFlux
var.description: Heat flux associated with iceberg melt. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: initialMass
var.description: Total initial mass of ice and snow

var.name: finalMass
var.description: Total final mass of ice and snow

var.name: massChange
var.description: Total mass change of ice and snow during time step

var.name: netMassFlux
var.description: Net mass flux to ice

var.name: absoluteMassError
var.description: Absolute mass conservation error

var.name: relativeMassError
var.description: Relative mass conservation error

var.name: accumulatedRainFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from rain from coupler. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedSnowFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from snow from coupler. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedEvaporationFlux
var.description: Evaporation flux from coupler. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedSeaIceFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from sea ice from coupler. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedRiverRunoffFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from river runoff from coupler. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedIceRunoffFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from ice runoff from coupler. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedRemovedRiverRunoffFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from river runoff from the coupler that was removed due to config_remove_AIS_coupler_runoff option. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedRemovedIceRunoffFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from ice runoff from the coupler that was removed due to config_remove_AIS_coupler_runoff option. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedIcebergFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from iceberg melt from coupler. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedFrazilFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from frazil freezing under sea ice. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedLandIceFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from land ice melt from coupler. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedLandIceFrazilFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from frazil freezing under land ice. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: initialSalt
var.description: Total initial salt of ice and snow

var.name: finalSalt
var.description: Total final salt of ice and snow

var.name: saltChange
var.description: Total salt change of ice and snow during time step

var.name: netSaltFlux
var.description: Net salt flux to ice

var.name: absoluteSaltError
var.description: Absolute salt conservation error

var.name: relativeSaltError
var.description: Relative salt conservation error

var.name: accumulatedSeaIceSalinityFlux
var.description: Sea ice salinity flux from coupler. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedFrazilSalinityFlux
var.description: Salinity flux from frazil to sea ice, given to coupler. Positive into the ocean.

var.name: accumulatedLandIceFrazilSalinityFlux
var.description: Salinity flux from frazil to Land Ice, given to coupler. Positive into the ocean.
